### Goals

I want to be advancing the cutting edge of statistics and data science for personalizing medicine, discovering markers of disease, identifying efficacy and safety signals in real-world data, and optimizing the health and economic benefits of medications.

The purpose of this website is not just to introduce my work, but also to blog about the latest statistical and programming advances.
